attributes.title: So terrible
attributes.review: It hacked all my information and leaked all over the internet. My credit card number was taken, along with my name and address. DO NOT DOWNLOAD OR SIGN UP!!!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: this app is TERRIBLE worst thing I’ve ever downloaded. They stole my information and HACKED ME. They also have fake news. They stand for DISGUSTING things. Do not download this app. It will brainwash you into a TERRIBLE person.🤬

attributes.title: NOT WORTH IT
attributes.review: I had complications even BEFORE downloading the app. I’m not really sure what even went right. All I can say is this App is No ❤️. Now excuse me while I go throw some oranges at the wall☺️

attributes.title: Zero stars
attributes.review: If I could rate this zero stars I would. Frankly, it just said it could do a lot and it didn’t. Not good at all. Not good. Fake news, I think. Frankly disappointing.

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: This app hacked me but got me a lot of tik tok followers it hacked my dog cuz he started to glitch a lot 🤣 then it hacked my toilet I didn’t want to flush🤦‍♀️ then it hacked the air cuz we got COVID in the air have a bad day Trump 🙃Sorry Not Sorry

attributes.title: Vile app.. do not use
attributes.review: This app is horrible and needs to be shut down.  How is this still even an option? Don’t use it!

attributes.title: Horrible app take it off please
attributes.review: Gave my phone a virus. Would not work. I had to buy a new phone. Very disappointed.

attributes.title: he tried
attributes.review: this is a horrible app for a horrible man. stay in your lane and stop trying to take away the voice of Gen z

attributes.title: Upset
attributes.review: This is the worst subway surfer update ever. I am so upset rn because subway surfer was my favorite game cube game and now it’s not even backwards compatible with my PlayStation 3. Absolutely awful 1 star

attributes.title: Gross
attributes.review: it’s a virus don’t get it. it makes you support a klan-backed, misogynist person for president. this disgusts me and i feel gross just downloading the app. i wish i could give it zero stars. SAD!!
